Articles.Content:
Hey all, finally got round to registering on here! Seems like a awesome community, looking forward to being a part of it.

The names Dio, I'm 20 and from South Wales, I found KSP whilst playing EVE Online, so as you can imagine I'm spending far too much time flying spaceships.

Space is just so damn awesome.

So yeah I hope to get to know some of you guys and become a part of a great community, looking at getting some mods as well really like the look of

some of them. Might have a hand at putting a few together myself if I find the time between Uni and flaying spaceships

Think that's enough of an introductory post, have a good one!

Fly Safe! o7

Dio

Hi Dio, welcome to the community

It's always good when people turn their hand to add-on development, the range of mods people have made is eye opening, here's some of my favorites:

Tosh's Cart

Romfarer's Lazor

And everyones favorite autopilot, MechJeb

Cheers for the welcome

Will most definitely have to give those mods a shot. Think I've seen a Saturn V mod around somewhere which I'm eager to try out as well.

Edited September 5, 2012 by Dio
